snippet: A scientific award sponsored by a repressive West African dictator was approved by the United Nations cultural heritage agency, but it will not bear his name.
abstract: Executive board of Unesco approves a scientific award sponsored by the longtime Equatorial Guinea dictator Teodoro Obiang Nguema Mbasogo; pleadings of Western nations and a finding by Unesco's lawyers prompt a change in the title of the award to omit Obiang's name.
lead_paragraph: A scientific award sponsored by a repressive West African dictator was approved by the United Nations cultural heritage agency, but it will not bear his name.

headline.seo: Unesco Backs Divisive Equatorial Guinea Prize

keywords.value: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization
keywords.name: organizations
